translations: adj.电解的；电解质的；由电解产生的

phrs.translation: 电解清洗，电化学清洗；电解清洁法

sentences.sentence: On top of this, coconut water has the same level of electrolytic balance human blood.
sentences.translation: 此外，在帮助人体血液达到电解与平衡上，椰子汁也有同样的功效。

sentences.sentence: To recover the few micrograms of gold deposited on the pins, we're going to use an electrolytic cell.
sentences.translation: 要想获得针脚上那几微克的金我们需要一个电解池。

sentences.sentence: Even sugar-packed fizzy drinks proclaim their “electrolytic value” and call themselves “sports drinks”.
sentences.translation: 即使添加大量糖分的碳酸饮料居然也称具有“电解功效”，并自称为“运动饮料”。
